website_summaries.verdict: A premium eyebrow powder that comes at a lower price point than many others in its class.
pros: Lightweight powder that comes in versatile neutral shades that work well for most skin tones and hair colors
Fills in sparse brows nicely, and provides long wear
cons: Not as pigmented as some competitors
Keep in mind when choosing your shade that they look a bit darker in person than online

customer_reviews.title: Great brow powder for darker brows
customer_reviews.text: I have dark brown/black hair and my eyebrows are already naturally kind of full, but I've found that wearing even light eye makeup and not filling in my brows sometimes looks a bit unbalanced. I found this brow powder is perfect for lightly filling in some of the sparser areas. I either use this as my only brow product, or sometimes I'll pull in a lighter brown color to fill in the inner parts of my eyebrows. I'll also use this as an eyeshadow to smoke out my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Statistical ArtistTop Contributor: Watercolor Painting

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for better, but sadly, this brow powder fell short. Very poor pigment. For someone who needs to fill-in their brows, this may work. But I have extremely sparse brows, so I need to create them daily, and this powder barely has any color density to it. I wouldn’t recommend this product for anyone who needs what I do. Don’t waste ur money. Bobbi Brown or Tarte (which I’ve used in the past) have some that work great. I guess u really DO get what u pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sumlkithot23

customer_reviews.title: Lasts and lasts and lasts
customer_reviews.text: Brow Pow is awesome. It gives professional results, lasts all day, and looks amazing. Don't let the small package fool you! This stuff lasts for a very long time. Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Clicker

customer_reviews.title: Looks amazing and is easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Loving this better than anything I could buy for 50 bucks. It lasts forever-is easy to apply and looks so natural. I love this so much. They have a store in SF that I had my brows done at so this is what the pros use so I bought it and I'll never go back!! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: That you need a slanted eyebrow brush to use it with.
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyebrow powder, this is a re-purchase of a product I love. I use a slanted eyebrow brush with it. It goes on nicely, and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fink

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I will probably buy this again. I ordered blonde but it gets darker over the day. The reason 'd buy it again is there isn't anything I can find that goes on and stays on as well, uses very little (one has lasted over 3 months of daily use and still going), and the color change must not be a game changer for me. You'd have to decide. It would be perfect if it didn't get a shade or so darker after 8 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply w/professional results, last beautifully until you take it off & get the pro Brow Brush; the perfect tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I've tried this product. I've been using a really good pencil but have been wanting to try a powder. I LOVE this & won't ever use a pencil again. Even the first time I used theBalm BrowPow, I was surprised how easily it applied & how it lasted all day. Many days, I work 12 hrs & it looks as good before I take it off as it did when I put it on. BTW, I also bought the pro Brow Brush - duo Angled Eyebrow Brush....absolutely perfect tool for applying a powder eyebrow product. This is definitely my new fave!!! Try it! You won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: There was more fallout than I'd expected. The color is much darker than what is shown in the photograph. The product arrived with some cracks in the pressed powder, I would guess the packaging doesn't protect the product well. If you're looking for an eyebrow powder, I'd check out the Kryolan brow palette.
customer_reviews.author: RYWTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Great texture
customer_reviews.text: Coordinates with my darker color of the same product. A little bit too powdery but still able to work with it. I use these two items more than any other brow products. Better results than pencil.
customer_reviews.author: daddysmoney

customer_reviews.title: best eyebrow powder on the market
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this powder I've been using it for the last 3 years. It's the only brow product I use now and I've been using many different products over the years. It shapes and fills nicely, great color and consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting product
customer_reviews.text: Second time buying this bc it works so well for filling my eyebrows. Not too powdery or flaky. Leaves natural finish and I apply it with a swivel brush
customer_reviews.author: Abby S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was used as theatrical character makeup and worked beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A King

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the consistency. I have to be careful not to apply too much though.
customer_reviews.author: MichVerchVT

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrow Excellence!
customer_reviews.text: I have almost black eyebrows and the dark brown powder really fills them in nicely. It seems as if it will last a long time and is very easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Dean Mack

customer_reviews.title: Not pigmented
customer_reviews.text: Good for just filling in or adding definition, but this won't shape or fix bald spots.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Summers

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade of brown!
customer_reviews.text: I live for this stuff! It’s the perfect shade of brown for eyebrows and matches my hair well. It doesn’t come off with a red tint like some shadow or pencils do. My FAVE eyebrow product.
customer_reviews.author: J's Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this brow powder. It perfectly fills in my sparse eyebrows, naturally!
customer_reviews.author: MMama2007

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty much just eyeshadow, or at least that's what it feels like. It smears easily. I would rate it maybe three stars, except I think the price is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yuk
customer_reviews.text: Too dark! I put this on sparingly - it's impossible to put on any less - but still I look angry. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: nclinnea

customer_reviews.title: I love this powder and theBalm in general
customer_reviews.text: I love this powder and theBalm in general. The size of the container is perfect, and the powder stays on all day. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: NatalieS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow powder. Easy to apply and the color is great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This eyebrow powder is amazing! It stays on all day. The match is perfect. I highly recommend theBalm BrowPow.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: I'd be happier, it just goes on more as a brown ...
customer_reviews.text: If it were lighter, I'd be happier, it just goes on more as a brown than a light brown
customer_reviews.author: jbird

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! It applies very easily and matches the color I expected. I only need to put this on in the morning and it lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Ashleigh

customer_reviews.title: ... the second one I have been through - Looks super natural and the pigment stays forever
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I have been through - Looks super natural and the pigment stays forever!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Winters

customer_reviews.title: Nice brow color
customer_reviews.text: Nice color, lasting product. Package is nice. Has a very tiny mirror on the inside and magnetic closure.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really like how real and natural it looks on my eye brows.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Montoya

customer_reviews.title: This is by far my favorite eyebrow filler
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my favorite eyebrow filler. I will use this until they stop selling it. Love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Rosenthal

customer_reviews.title: Really great quality, easy to apply (so long as you ...
customer_reviews.text: Really great quality, easy to apply (so long as you have the right brush for brows) fast shipping, and the color is pretty good... I read another review saying the colors show up much darker so I ordered light brown for my dark hair color- don't trust that! The colors are pretty accurate, so I'm ordering a dark brown to match my eyebrow color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great color. one of the best brow powders ive ...
customer_reviews.text: Great color.one of the best brow powders ive found.natural looking,doesnt go on too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer e. cannon

customer_reviews.title: In LOVE with this product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time getting this product and I love it so much. The product itself comes with a lot so it lasts for a LONG time. It doesn’t come off even sweating at work it doesn’t come off. It’s easy to take off at the end of the day. I use dark brown and that’s perfect for me. I use this with an angled brush to fill in my brows using a primer first.
customer_reviews.author: Zindarella

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product, something changed
customer_reviews.text: This product has recently changed. I bought the same 'dark brown' color I've been buying for years. The new dark brown is way too dark and poor quality. lt doesn't last, it doesn't cover bald spots, regardless of brush.
customer_reviews.author: AV1177

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this powder!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the color of powder and it is easy to apply to get a natural looking, highlighted brow!
customer_reviews.author: jnordhaus

product_meta.title: theBalm BrowPow
product_meta.description: Color:Dark BrownConquer any brow crisis and defeat your arch-enemies with this long wearing brow powder from theBalm. Whether you're aiming for brows that pack a punch, or want to capture a soft and subtle look, BrowPow is ready for action! With 3 neutral shades to choose from, you are bound to find the sidekick you've been looking for.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
